annular_wedge

  • x, y
  • start_radius, end_radius
  • start_angle, end_angle
  • direction
    • values ['clock', 'anticlock'] (default: 'anticlock')
  • line properties
  • fill properties
{ type: 'annular_wedge' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' start_radius: 5 end_radius: 10 start_angle: "starts" end_angle: "ends" }

annulus

  • x, y
  • start_radius, end_radius
  • line properties
  • fill properties
{ type: 'annulus' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' start_radius: 5 end_radius: 10 }

arc

  • x, y
  • radius
  • start_angle, end_angle
  • direction
    • values ['clock', 'anticlock'] (default: 'anticlock')
  • line properties
{ type: 'arc' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' radius: 5 start_angle: "starts" end_angle: "ends" }

asterisk

  • x, y
  • size
  • line properties
{ type: 'asterisk' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' size: 5 }

bezier

  • x0, y0
  • x1, y1
  • cx0, cy0
  • cx1, cy1
  • line properties
{ type: 'bezier' x0: 'x0s' y0: 'y0s' x1: 'x1s' y1: 'y1s' cx0: 'control_x0s' cy0: 'control_y0s' cx1: 'control_x1s' cy1: 'control_y1s' }

circle

  • x, y
  • radius
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'circle' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' radius: 5 }

circle_cross

  • x, y
  • size
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'circle_cross' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' size: 5 }

circle_x

  • x, y
  • size
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'circle_x' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' size: 5 }

cross

  • x, y
  • size
  • line properties
{ type: 'cross' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' size: 5 }

diamond

  • x, y
  • size
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'diamond' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' size: 5 }

diamond_cross

  • x, y
  • size
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'diamond_cross' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' size: 5 }

image

  • image
  • width, height
  • x, y
  • dw, dh
  • palette
{ type: 'image' image: 'image_data' width: 300 height: 400 x: 5 y: 8 palette: "Spectral" }

image_rgba

  • image
  • width, height
  • x, y
  • dw, dh
{ type: 'image_rgba' image: 'rgba_data' width: 300 height: 400 x: 5 y: 8 }

image_uri

  • x, y
  • url
  • angle
{ type: 'image_uri' x: 5 y: 8 url: "http://foo.bar/baz.png" }

inverted_triangle

inverted_triangle

  • x, y
  • size
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'inverted_triangle' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' size: 5 }

line

  • x, y
  • line properties
{ type: 'line' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' }

multi_line

  • xs, ys
  • line properties
{ type: 'multi_line' xs: 'xdata' ys: 'ydata' }

oval

  • x, y
  • width, height
  • angle (default: 0)
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'oval' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' width: 'widths' height: 10 angle: pi/4 }

patch

  • x, y
  • line properties
{ type: 'patch' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' }

patches

  • xs, ys
  • line properties
{ type: 'patches' xs: 'xdata' ys: 'ydata' }

quad

  • left
  • right
  • top
  • bottom
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'quad' left: 'lefts' right: 'rights' top: 2 bottom: 6 }

quadratic

  • x0, y0
  • x1, y1
  • cx, cy
  • line properties
{ type: 'quadratic' x0: 'x0s' y0: 'y0s' x1: 'x1s' y1: 'y1s' cx: 'control_xs' cy: 'control_ys' }

ray

  • x0, y0
  • length
  • angle
  • line properties
{ type: 'ray' x0: 'x0' y0: 'y0' length: 20 angle: 'angles' }

rect

  • x, y
  • width, height
  • angle (default: 0)
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'rect' x: 'x' y: 'y' width: 2 height: 6 size: 5 }

segment

  • x0, y0
  • x1, y1
  • line properties
{ type: 'segment' x0: 'x0' y0: 'y0' x1: 6 y1: 'y1' }

square

  • x, y
  • size
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'square' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' size: 5 }

square_cross

  • x, y
  • size
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'square_cross' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' size: 5 }

square_x

  • x, y
  • size
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'square_x' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' size: 5 }

text

  • x, y
  • text
  • angle (default: 0)
  • text properties
{ type: 'text' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' text: "foo bar baz" }

wedge

  • x, y
  • radius
  • start_angle, end_angle
  • direction
    • values ['clock', 'anticlock'] (default: 'anticlock')
  • fill properties
  • line properties
{ type: 'wedge' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' radius: 5 start_angle: "starts" end_angle: "ends" }

x

x

  • x, y
  • size
  • line properties
{ type: 'x' x: 'xdata' y: 'ydata' size: 5 }
